docs.snippet: LONDON, July 9 -- The British Government has withdrawn the permission given to the United Nations committee on South-West Africa to visit Bechuanaland.
docs.lead_paragraph: LONDON, July 9 -- The British Government has withdrawn the permission given to the United Nations committee on South-West Africa to visit Bechuanaland.
docs.abstract: GB withdraws permission to visit Bechuanaland; holds com would not give assurances that it would not try to cross border; com holds closed confs, Salisbury

headline.main: U.N. GROUP'S TOUR HALTED IN AFRICA; Britain Rescinds Permission for Bechuanaland Visit

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, July 9 -- The United States plans to pledge to Latin America at next month's ministerial conference in Uruguay far-ranging financial assistance within the framework of the Alliance for Progress program.

docs.abstract: speculation on what US will offer under program at conf; E M Kennedy unofficial tour in July seen aimed at gauging Latin Amer feeling

headline.main: U.S. SET TO OFFER STRONG LATIN AID; Edward Kennedy to Tour Region on 'Alliance' Plan

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, July 12 (UPI) -- A small squadron of United States warships will circumnavigate South America and conduct anti-submarine maneuvers in conjunction with South American countries during a four-month period beginning Aug. 7.

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, July 18 -- President Joaquin Balaguer of the Dominican Republic has informed the Organization of American States that he would welcome the return of its investigators to help bring about the lifting of sanctions imposed on his country...
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, July 18 -- President Joaquin Balaguer of the Dominican Republic has informed the Organization of American States that he would welcome the return of its investigators to help bring about the lifting of sanctions imposed on his country last year.
docs.abstract: Balaguer tells OAS he would welcome return of investigating com to help end sanctions; Govt seen having to prove dem intentions by holding elections and accepting results

headline.main: BALAGUER INVITES O.A.S. TO RETURN; Dominican Welcomes Inquiry to Help Lift Sanctions
